description:
WritePad HD for the HP TouchPad is a simple but robust notepad application. 
Write your documents, notes, memos, status updates and more with the option to save them for later.

The WritePad HD utilizes the TouchPad virtual keyboard but has another custom keyboard. this version support Hebrew virtual keyboard (on devices that support Hebrew fonts)

Features:
* Stores and Retrieves documents
* Navigation Keys for easy cursor positioning
* Send the document to the email, messaging and memo applications
* Update your Facebook status or tweet using Spaz HD
* Send the text directly to search engines and web sites such as Google, Bing, Yahoo, Wikipedia, flickr, youtube and more
* Set Font size that is best for you
* Special optional Hebrew keyboard layout (requires Hebrew fonts to be installed manually)
* Supports both left-to-right and right-to-left text direction  
* Easy select all, copy & paste features built in

no need to wait for editing applications such as QuickOffice to write your notes.
